title: Custom Assets
description: AdvantageScope uses a default set of flat field images, field models, robot models, and joystick configurations. Simple assets (e.g. evergreen fields) are included in the initial installation. Detailed assets (e.g. season-specific fields) are downloaded automatically in the background when AdvantageScope is connected to the internet. To check the status of these downloads, click Help > Asset Download Status....

next.title: Converting Onshape & STEP Files to glTF
